mapper.select: SELECT EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ AS apiLogSeq /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.API_TYPE AS apiType /* API 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.API_RESPON_DIV AS apiResponDiv /* API 응답 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.AGENT_TYPE AS agentType /* 에이전트 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.LOG_DT AS logDt /* 로그 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.ERR_YN AS errYn /* 오류 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.ERR_MSG AS errMsg /* 오류 메시지, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REQ_TXT AS reqTxt /* REQ TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.RES_TXT AS resTxt /* RES TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_API_LOG /* API 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ = #{apiLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_API_LOG /* API 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ = #{apiLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.ERR_MSG LIKE '%' || #{errMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 오류 메시지, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.REQ_TXT LIKE '%' || #{reqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* REQ TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.RES_TXT LIKE '%' || #{resTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* RES TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ AS apiLogSeq /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.API_TYPE AS apiType /* API 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.API_RESPON_DIV AS apiResponDiv /* API 응답 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.AGENT_TYPE AS agentType /* 에이전트 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.LOG_DT AS logDt /* 로그 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.ERR_YN AS errYn /* 오류 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.ERR_MSG AS errMsg /* 오류 메시지, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REQ_TXT AS reqTxt /* REQ TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.RES_TXT AS resTxt /* RES TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_API_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_API_LOG /* API 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ = #{param.apiLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.ERR_MSG LIKE '%' || #{param.errMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 오류 메시지, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.REQ_TXT LIKE '%' || #{param.reqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* REQ TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_API_LOG.RES_TXT LIKE '%' || #{param.resTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* RES TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */
ORDER BY EZC_API_LOG.API_LOG_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_API_LOG SET /* API 로그 */ API_TYPE = #{apiType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,API_RESPON_DIV = #{apiResponDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 응답 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,AGENT_TYPE = #{agentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 에이전트 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,LOG_DT = #{logDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 로그 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,ERR_YN = #{errYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 오류 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,ERR_MSG = #{errMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 오류 메시지, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,REQ_TXT = #{reqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* REQ TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,RES_TXT = #{resTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* RES TXT, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND API_LOG_SEQ = #{apiLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_API_LOG /* API 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND API_LOG_SEQ = #{apiLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* API 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
